basics.name: Niklas Hansen
basics.label: Senior Software Developer
basics.summary: Started experimenting with (web) development during Primary School, and started working as freelancer in high school. I have since worked in a variety of different sectors, gaining valuable skills going forward. I am somewhat of a "techie" and I love implementing technology to help ease day-to-day work.

highlights: Backend development
Technical design and architecture
Roadmap creation for systems
Developing backend systems, and backend-for-frontends
Creating services communicating with 3rd parties / external partners
Tech stack: C#, TypeScript (Angular), Ionic, OpenShift (Kubernetes), SQL Server, IBM MQ
work.summary: Jyske Bank is a Danish bank and mortgage credit company. I spent the first 5 years developing and maintaining systems regarding registration of real estate, property data and real estate valuation. I recently transitioned into a new position/team, focusing on customer self-service, app development and backend-for-frontend.

highlights: Implementing new Dynamics AX installations, and customizing for customer needs
Developing integrations with 3rd party vendors and other products
Tech stack: Dynamics AX, X++, C#, SQL Server
work.summary: Netcompany is a Danish consultancy for both private sector and public sector customers. I worked in the ERP division, where I primarily worked with Microsoft Dynamics AX implementations.

highlights: Backend development
Implementation of letter fulfillment process - generating letters, printing SIM-cards, and sending to printer
Implementation of dunning flow and process
Tech stack: C#, JavaScript, RavenDB, RabbitMQ, Amazon AWS (micro-service architecture), EventStore
work.summary: Justfone was a start-up phone operator, with focus on building the entire system landscape from ground up, and giving customers more than they would get elsewhere. Justfone ended up being sold to TDC, and becoming Fullrate Erhverv.

highlights: Conversion of test cases using legacy framework in X++, to updated frameworks in C#.
work.summary: I was a student worker in ERP division of Microsoft, working on the Dynamics AX product.

highlights: Development of websites and webshops for customers
Maintenance of customer's website
Development and maintenance of internal communication tool
Tech stack: PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ExtJS), MySQL
work.summary: Relation Technology was a small Danish web consultancy, with a wide variety of customers.

highlights: Developing websites for customers (both frontend and backend)
Development of the company's CMS
Tech stack: PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript (jQuery), MySQL
work.summary: Customerwise was a small Danish web consultancy, with a wide variety of customers.

volunteer.summary: StreetCup was an organization fighting for legal street racing in Denmark

courses: BDSA - Analysis, design and software architecture
SIGB - Introductory graphics and image analysis

education.studyType: Municipal primary and lower secondary school
